summary: The module defines automated tests for the Latent Consistency Model image‑to‑image pipeline, including fast unit tests that verify callback handling, deterministic inference, IP‑adapter integration, custom timestep usage, and both multistep and single‑step generation, as well as slower integration tests that exercise the full pipeline with realistic inputs.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, stability, and feature coverage of the latent consistency image‑to‑image generation pipeline to support reliable releases and downstream applications.
